author: Staff Reporter
text:
Human Resource Development Minister Smriti Irani on Monday blamed Congress vice-president Rahul Gandhi for trying to derive political mileage in the name of students’ rights.

Mocking Mr. Gandhi’s “false sympathies” in the cause of Dalit students, she alleged that the Congress was politicising an unfortunate incident (the suicide of Dalit research scholar Rohith Vemula of the University of Hyderabad.)

The Minister was addressing BJP cadres at Tanda near Dharamsala.

Convocation

Earlier, she attended the 3rd convocation of the Central University at Kangra. Ms. Irani praised the university for its academic achievements.

The Minister promised that the Central University would soon get land allotted for its own campus in Himachal Pradesh.
title: Rahul politicising suicide issue, says Smriti
